name: Shark® SmoothStyle™ Heated Comb Straightener and Smoother
categories: Hair, Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is:A styler designed to straighten and smooth hair with heated comb technology for a healthy, voluminous finish..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Straightens and polishes with lower temperatures than traditional flat irons.What Else You Need to Know:SmoothStyle™ is engineered to flawlessly smooth and bring volume to straight, wavy, curly, and coily hair. It has three preset air temperature settings, one preset heated smoothing comb setting, and includes a cool-touch tip to hold onto for more control during styling.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Blowout Mode: .-Begin with 50 percent dry hair. .-Detangle hair fully before styling. .-Section your hair as desired. .-Place the bristles under the hair close to the roots..-Roll the brush outwards from the roots to the ends to engage the bristles and gently grip the hair..-Finally, change to the Cool temperature setting to lock in your style. ..Smooth Your Style: .-Begin with dry hair. .-Detangle your hair..-Section your hair as desired..-Make sure the Heated Smoothing Comb Readiness indicator light is green. .-Start styling by placing the Heated Smoothing Comb under the hair close to the roots..-Rotate the brush 180°F so hair is in both combs..-Pull through from the roots to the ends. .-Repeat on remaining sections until your hair has been smoothed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blow dryer/straightener! For context I have 3c/4a tight curly hair that I only straighten 1-2 times a year and this allowed me to get my hair straight at home in less than 90 minutes. I love how there are multiple heat settings for the blow dryer,  I just wish there was a lower temp option for the straightening comb (I believe it’s 420F) since I don’t need it that high for touch ups . But other than that I absolutely love it! I completely ditched my flat iron

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this tool. I have a lot of fine curly hair that is quite long at the moment. I read that you are supposed to have your hair 70% dry before using this tool. When I gave my hair a quick once over with the blow dryer it made using this tool a breeze. It did give my fine hair some volume which was great and the shape/volume was still great the next day.   The biggest drawback for me was how loud it is. My ears are quite sensitive and having this tool right beside my head for a while wasn't a good fit. But I have tried other brushes like this and had the same issue with all of them. Now I simply put in my Loops earplugs and it doesn't bother me. It seems extreme but if you're really sensitive to ANY loud noise for a bit of an extended time frame then it might work for you too.  For people saying the straightening part didn't work, perhaps they were not going slow enough. I have quite wavy/curl hair and if you follow the instructions it does work. Use small sections, keep it somewhat taught, go slow and if you want the hair to flip at the end then you can twist it as you reach the ends. Make sure you brush your hair first! It's not an actual comb or brush for detangling, you need to start with untangled hair just like you would with a straightener or curling iron.

reviews.review_title: Love this product! Recommend for curly/wavy hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Shark SmoothStyle Heated Comb Straightener and Smoother pleasantly surprised me! It took me a bit longer than usual to dry my hair, but it was worth it for the silky straight smoothness of my hair. My hair has a slight wave in it and this straightened and smoothed it out completely. I also found it easy to use and my hair felt silky and healthy afterwards. Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to get one of those heated straightening combs and this one is just perfect. It’s easy to operate, has rotating long cable and I love that you can use it both on dry and wet hair. The brush has two different bristle types which makes the whole straightening process easier. It’s slightly heavy but I really like it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Shark SmoothStyle was a pleasure to use. It significantly sped up my hair drying time. The brush easily detangled my hair with a few swipes (with the heat off) and dried it straight in no time on the max setting. As someone with type 4a hair who prefers the straight natural look, the blow-dry step is crucial for achieving a flat and sleek finish before flat ironing. This tool was able to get my chest-length hair from damp to a straight blowout in about 30 to 40 minutes, and the flat iron process afterward only took about 20 minutes.  While the heated combs on the side don't achieve the same result as a flat iron and can't get as close to the roots, they're excellent for touching up your style or smoothing out a ponytail between wash days. Overall, I enjoyed using this product and will continue to use it instead of my previous blowdryer brush due to its speed in detangling and drying

reviews.review_title: A great tool for my low-maintenance routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed by the blow-out I achieved with this product. I don't typically blow-dry my hair because it's too time-consuming, but the heated comb was fast and effective. I prefer to use the heating straightener feature which brings flat hair back to life days after a wash. One downside, but it could be a bonus depending on how you look at it, is that this device is HEAVY. My right shoulder gets quite a workout when styling my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this weekly and it really helps straighten my thick, wavy hair without causing damage. It took a little getting used to but I love that there is a dry and wet hair mode.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this a few times now and am liking the blow out look it helps me achieve as I like to have volume in my hair. Took a few tries before figuring it out though.

reviews.review_title: Works well even with really long hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product several times over the last couple of weeks I have really enjoyed it! I have excessively long, thick and very curly hair. It is a challenge on most days to even brush it out fully! I found that with the SmoothStyle I can get my hair to a manageable stage after about an hour of use. I start with my hair damp and use the blow function at the highest heat, and then switch to the heat after my hair is dry. It does not come out completely straight when complete but my hair does feel much healhier than after using a traditional straightner. It takes quite a while to get through my long hair so patience is a must! Otherwise, it works well just like very other shark product we have.
took a while getting used to it, but it works well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine medium length hair and I was really worried about this causing breakage but it has been very gentle as far as heated styling goes!  The dry setting is not very hot and as long as I brush the section beforehand it doesn't pull or break. I love this thing, it makes styling my hair so easy and quick. I only styled my hair 1/month before this because I was afraid of damage but now I do it 1/week and it hasn't caused any damage!
Took some getting used to but I love that it keeps the volume in my hair while giving it a sleeker look!

This tool gives a great blowout look, has great tension and gives such smooth shiny hair once you are finished. Such a great staple to have any day of the week! This tool compared to other brands on the market does not damage your hair and keeps the integrity of your hair. 10/10!!

I used to use the revlon one step blow dryer and it frieddd my hair!! I loved the look of my blow out after using it though, so when I saw that shark came out with one I knew I had to try! And of course like all shark products it did not disappoint!

reviews.review_text: Took a bit of time to get the hang of this but I love the smooth blow out look I’m left with. I have pretty straight hair with little volume and this brush definitely helps add some life to it! Woulrecommend

It takes a bit of troubleshooting but once I figured out how it best worked with my hair I really liked it! I especially like that you can use it on wet hair or dry hair, and it's really easy to hold and maneuver.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This styler is great for a blow-out look. I found that it held enough tension on my hair to actually smooth out my natural waves and ponytail kinks (even at the root and on baby hairs!) but not so much that it tugged at or snapped any hair. I also really appreciate that I can touch up my blow-out with the same tool, rather than having to get out my curling iron. I do wish it had a cool shot and multiple heat options for the dry styler, but overall I'm really happy with it.

reviews.review_text: I love this brush! Takes all frizz away I have really wavy/curly hair and it's smooths it out. I do apply a blow out hair detangler by (r+co) before hand which helps get a nice beachy wave while drying.  I hope they come out with another style like this just a smaller brush size.. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Serial flat iron user with fine, heat damaged, curly hair that hits below shoulders. I wanted something to help cut back the use of hot tools I use to get straight, manageable hair. This seemed to be a holy grail, 2 in 1 tool at a great price.  So I thought I’d try it! Previously I would use my CHI 4 in 1 styler with round brush attachment to blow dry then I would flat iron for stick straight, lifeless hair.  This tool is much heavier then I’m use to. It is SUPER loud. Has 3 blow dry settings and every setting is equally as loud but gets hotter and I mean Hot. So I’m not sure how this tool claims to use “style without heat”. The straightening part of this tool is weak. Maybe my hair is too fine and short to get enough tension needed to smooth it out but, it just doesn’t work for me. The highest setting on the blow dryer is hotter. I find I have to “smooth” then blow dry again to set the blow out.  I have yet to see what this tool does for a second day refresh because it’s too loud for me to use in my house at 6am. I despise how loud it is.  However, I do love how my hair is just leaving it blown out - which I normally hate (hence: stick straight lifeless looking hair) this tool has grown on me.  My hair genuinely feels and looks healthier.  Therefore i give 4 stars for that alone.
